string-array.name: faq_questions
string-array.item: Q: What are the operating hours?
Q: Do you offer vegan options?
Q: How can I make a reservation?
Q: What is your delivery radius?
Q: Do you have gluten-free options?
Q: What payment methods do you accept?
Q: Can I modify my order after placing it?
Q: Can I modify my order after placing it?
Q: Can I modify my order after placing it?
Q: Can I modify my order after placing it?

string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: Ans: Our operating hours are from 9 AM to 10 PM from Monday to Sunday.
Ans: Yes, we offer a variety of vegan options on our menu. Please check the Vegan section in our app.
Ans: You can make a reservation by calling us at our contact number or through our website and app.
Ans: We deliver within a 5-mile radius from our location. Please enter your address in the app to check if we deliver to you.
Ans: Yes, we have a selection of gluten-free dishes. Look for the gluten-free label on our menu items.
Ans: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.
Ans: Yes, you can modify your order within 10 minutes of placing it by contacting our customer support.
Ans: Yes, you can modify your order within 10 minutes of placing it by contacting our customer support.
Ans: Yes, you can modify your order within 10 minutes of placing it by contacting our customer support.
Ans: Yes, you can modify your order within 10 minutes of placing it by contacting our customer support.
